name: Cat's Haven
description:
Cats Haven!

Play as Linh, a young care taker who wanted to help the lost cats souls that roams the woods. Collect all the cats and take care of them by feeding and talking to them! Make sure u fish out their favourite fish if u want them to like you!

This is a short game that was made in a private game jam of 48 hours.
We are a group of 4 friends (two Devs, 2 artists) who wanted to try and make a game together.

Team:
Lyddar - Project Manager Developer
Dani - Developer
Maya - Characters(+) artist
Amit - Enviroument artist

The whole process was broadcasted LIVE on twitch by LyddarS (twitch.tv/LyddarS)

Controls:

E - To interact & fish
C - To cancel fishing action & pet cats
R - To feed cats (if you have their favourite fish)
